context_of_use: This use case allows customers to browse and search for products to find items that meet their needs.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: wants to find and evaluate products easily.
description: Enables customers to browse and search product listings and view detailed product information.
triggering_event: Customer initiates a product browsing session.
preconditions: Customer is logged into the system.
postconditions: Customer can view product listings and details.
assumptions: The customer has an active account to log in.
requirements_met: The system shall allow customers to browse products by category.
The system shall allow customers to search for products by keyword.
The system shall allow customers to view product details.
outstanding_issues: Need to define how product categories are structured.
main_flow: 1. Customer browses products by category → System displays product listings by selected category.
2. Customer searches for products by keyword → System displays search results matching the keyword.
3. Customer views product details → System presents detailed information about the selected product.
